com.github.rjbx.calibrater

Class Calibrater

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.rjbx.calibrater.Calibrater

  • public final class Calibrater
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for adjusting and calibrating percent arrays.

    • Method Detail

      • shiftRatings

        public static boolean shiftRatings(double[] percents,
                                   int targetIndex,
                                   double magnitude,
                                   int precision)
        Increments or decrements a double array element by the specified magnitude while calibrating other double array elements to maintain proportionality.
        Parameters:
        percents - double array elements to be adjusted if not proportionate
        targetIndex - index of the array element to be adjusted
        magnitude - amount of the adjustment; non-zero value should be no more than 1 or -1
        precision - number of decimal places to move the allowed error from the whole
        Returns:
        true if percent was adjusted and false otherwise

      • resetRatings

        public static boolean resetRatings(double[] percents,
                                   boolean forceReset,
                                   java.lang.Integer precision)
        Reads double array and assigns equivalent percents to each double array element.
        Parameters:
        percents - double array elements to be reset if not equivalent
        precision - number of decimal places to move the allowed error from the whole
        Returns:
        true if array was reset and false otherwise

      • removeRating

        public static boolean removeRating(double[] percents,
                                   int index)
        Reads double array and assigns equivalent percents to each double array element.
        Parameters:
        percents - double array elements to be calibrated if not proportionate

      • recalibrateRatings

        public static boolean recalibrateRatings(double[] percents,
                                         boolean forceReset,
                                         java.lang.Integer precision)
        Reads double array and equally distributes to each array element the difference between the whole and the sum of all array elements.
        Parameters:
        percents - double array to be calibrated closer to the whole
